---
title: "Connect Cloud Healthcheck"
format: html
execute:
  echo: true
  warning: false
  message: false
  echo: false
---

```{r}
cat(
  "Posit Connect Cloud healthcheck\n",
  "Time (UTC): ", format(Sys.time(), tz = "UTC"), "\n\n",
  sep = ""
)

env_vars <- c("FINANCE_ENV", "FINANCE_DB_URL")
for (v in env_vars) {
  val <- Sys.getenv(v, unset = "<not set>")
  cat(sprintf("%s = %s\n", v, val))
}

cat("\nOK\n")
```
